tradingagents.graph

class tradingagents.graph.TradingAgentsGraph(selected_analysts=['market', 'social', 'news', 'fundamentals'], debug=False, config: Dict[str, Any] = None)[source]

Bases: object

Main class that orchestrates the trading agents framework.

propagate(company_name, trade_date)[source]

Run the trading agents graph for a company on a specific date.

reflect_and_remember(returns_losses)[source]

Reflect on decisions and update memory based on returns.

process_signal(full_signal)[source]

Process a signal to extract the core decision.

class tradingagents.graph.ConditionalLogic(max_debate_rounds=1, max_risk_discuss_rounds=1)[source]

Bases: object

Handles conditional logic for determining graph flow.

should_continue_market(state: AgentState)[source]

Determine if market analysis should continue.

should_continue_social(state: AgentState)[source]

Determine if social media analysis should continue.

should_continue_news(state: AgentState)[source]

Determine if news analysis should continue.

should_continue_fundamentals(state: AgentState)[source]

Determine if fundamentals analysis should continue.

should_continue_debate(state: AgentState) → str[source]

Determine if debate should continue.

should_continue_risk_analysis(state: AgentState) → str[source]

Determine if risk analysis should continue.

should_continue_onchain(state: AgentState)[source]

Determine if on-chain analysis should continue.

class tradingagents.graph.GraphSetup(quick_thinking_llm: ChatOpenAI, deep_thinking_llm: ChatOpenAI, toolkit: Toolkit, tool_nodes: Dict[str, ToolNode], bull_memory, bear_memory, trader_memory, invest_judge_memory, risk_manager_memory, conditional_logic: ConditionalLogic)[source]

Bases: object

Handles the setup and configuration of the agent graph.

setup_graph(selected_analysts=['market', 'social', 'news', 'fundamentals'])[source]

Set up and compile the agent workflow graph.

Parameters:

selected_analysts (list) – List of analyst types to include. Options are: - “market”: Market analyst - “social”: Social media analyst - “news”: News analyst - “fundamentals”: Fundamentals analyst - “onchain”: On-chain analyst (crypto mode only)

class tradingagents.graph.Propagator(max_recur_limit=100)[source]

Bases: object

Handles state initialization and propagation through the graph.

create_initial_state(company_name: str, trade_date: str) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Create the initial state for the agent graph.

get_graph_args() → Dict[str, Any][source]

Get arguments for the graph invocation.

class tradingagents.graph.Reflector(quick_thinking_llm: ChatOpenAI)[source]

Bases: object

Handles reflection on decisions and updating memory.

reflect_bull_researcher(current_state, returns_losses, bull_memory)[source]

Reflect on bull researcher’s analysis and update memory.

reflect_bear_researcher(current_state, returns_losses, bear_memory)[source]

Reflect on bear researcher’s analysis and update memory.

reflect_trader(current_state, returns_losses, trader_memory)[source]

Reflect on trader’s decision and update memory.

reflect_invest_judge(current_state, returns_losses, invest_judge_memory)[source]

Reflect on investment judge’s decision and update memory.

reflect_risk_manager(current_state, returns_losses, risk_manager_memory)[source]

Reflect on risk manager’s decision and update memory.

class tradingagents.graph.SignalProcessor(quick_thinking_llm: ChatOpenAI)[source]

Bases: object

Processes trading signals to extract actionable decisions.

process_signal(full_signal: str) → str[source]

Process a full trading signal to extract the core decision.

Parameters:

full_signal – Complete trading signal text

Returns:

Extracted decision (BUY, SELL, or HOLD)
